sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> is one of the <radical>few</radical> <kanji>strange</kanji> things in the world. Everything but a woman can be explained and made sense of. There are only a few strange things in this world, with woman being one of them.
meaningInfo: Imagine saying this to a woman. Try and imagine her face as you tell her how strange she is.
readingMnemonic: But when you think about it, we're all a little strange. Me, you, <reading>myou</reading> (<ja>みょう</ja>) everybody!
readingInfo: Who's strange? Me and you. Me, you - we are strange! Strange, strange, strange!
